RawLine: TNPC_70005781,【取得產自三派聖地，作為{color=#FF0000}藥引{/color}的礦石——{color=#FF0000}赤緒石{/color}。】,【取得产自三派圣地，作为{color=#FF0000}药引{/color}的矿石——{color=#FF0000}赤绪石{/color}。】

Items.r: 【取得產自三派聖地，作為{color=#FF0000}藥引{/color}的礦石——{color=#FF0000}赤緒石{/color}。】
Items.c: <[>取得產自三派聖地,作為藥引的礦石——赤緒石。<]>
Items.mt: <[>Obtain the ore from the sacred land of the three sects, which is used as a medicinal formula, the Red Thread Stone. <]>

Items.r: 【取得产自三派圣地，作为{color=#FF0000}药引{/color}的矿石——{color=#FF0000}赤绪石{/color}。】
